''Light shading indicates old polling data.'' | title = Incumbent | posttitle = President-elect | before_election = [[Barack Obama]] | before_party = Democratic Party (United States) | after_election = Barack Obama | after_party = Democratic Party (United States) }}{{US 2012 elections series}} This article provides a collection of statewide public [[opinion polls]] that were conducted relating to the [[United States presidential election, 2012|2012 United States presidential election]], which was won by incumbent [[President of the United States|President]] [[Barack Obama]]. The polls show the status between Republican [[Republican Party presidential primaries, 2012|nominee]] [[Mitt Romney]] and President Obama. Also included are three- and four-way race polls with the Republican and Democratic nominees against various [[Third party (United States)|third party]] candidates. ==Opinion polling: Obama vs Romney== ''Sample size key:'' LV – Likely Voters
RV – Registered Voters. ''Poll source key'' (R) – Source polls normally for Republicans
